YuJa Video

  • Learn how to insert a YuJa video into a new HTML page
    1. Open the source code editor on this page.
    2. Copy the code for the full div container below. It begins with <div class="video-container mb-4"> and contains the <iframe> embed code for the video below.
    3. Paste that code into a new HTML page.
    4. To get a new embed code from YuJa:
      1. Log in to YuJa. Locate the video you want to embed.
      2. Hover your cursor over the video thumbnail to display an options menu.
      3. Select "More".
      4. In the dialog box, select the "Links" tab.
      5. Copy the embed code.
    5. Return to your new HTML page.
    6. Paste the embed code from YuJa in place of the entire <iframe> code found in this sample page. DO NOT paste over the <div> container code. Paste the new <iframe> code into that container.
    7. Click save.
